Day 1 7/4/2021
  • Kunming to Shimian (Mount Gongga)
  • No collections
Day 2 7/5/2021
  • Shimian to Xinduqiaozhen
    • Revisit sites from previous years to collect morphometric data for species that we already have collections for (DE- accession numbers)
    • Collect P. davidii genome plant, RNAs for annotation, and silica leaf collections for 10 individuals for popgen.
    • Collect RNA for comparative transcriptomes for N species
    • Sites: 106, 107, 108, 109, 110
Day 2 7/5/2021
  • Xinduqiaozhen to Litang
    • Revisit sites from previous years to collect morphometric data for species that we already have collections for (DE- accession numbers)
    • Collect P. davidii genome plant, RNAs for annotation, and silica leaf collections for 10 individuals for popgen.
    • Collect RNA for comparative transcriptomes for N species
